Welcome to Lokki 3.0!
Now you can see where your friends and family members are on a map. You choose who can see where you are, and you can hide your location whenever you want.

Your privacy is of the utmost importance to us. Before you get started, you need to agree to the following terms:


1. I have read the terms of service and accept them.

2. I consent to the collection and processing of personal data.

3. I consent that the service can process and display my location.

4. If I am under 15, I have my parents’ permission to use Lokki according to these terms.

5. If I am under 13 and living in the United States, I may not use Lokki.
